products.title: Gloss White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Gloss Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Perforated White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Perforated White Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Whitewood Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Whitewood Woodline 9410 Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Galaxy asc Blackout White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Galaxy asc Blackout White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX6010. A stylish, blackout pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.
products.productdescription: Part of our Galaxy Blackout range, where Advanced Solar Control (ASC) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Hive Plain White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Hive Plain White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX71001. A contemporary dim-out blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal properties and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hive Plain White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Privacy non-Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.

products.title: Truth White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Truth Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Hive Blackout White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Hive Blackout White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Hive Blackout White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Hive Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Luna Blackout Cloud White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Luna Blackout Cloud White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.
products.productdescription: Luna Blackout Cloud White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Infusion asc White Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4101. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc White Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.
